text: Ej kasone, ki ʙa Alloh va rasulas imon ovardaed va ʙa sari'ati U amal kardaed, cun azoni namozi ruzi cum'a gufta savad, ʙa sui zikri Alloh ʙa gus kardani xutʙa va adoi namoz ʙisitoʙed va xaridu furusro va tamomi korhoe, ki sumoro az on masƣul mesozad, tark kuned. Agar ʙidoned, in dasturoti farmudasuda ʙarojaton ʙehtar ast
